item.title: Analysis of Medical Imaging Data
item.description: There are several projects on medical imaging data, including segmentation, alignment, feature detection and classification.

item.title: Computer Vision and Video Analytics for Medical Tasks
item.description: Computer vision has several uses in the medical domain. In MVAIT, researchers develop computer vision technologies and methods which can facilitate medical tasks.

item.title: Multimodal Data Analysis and Interpretation

item.title: Population Health
item.description: The research on population health is important for the advancement of medical technologies for the society.

item.title: NLP for Healthcare
item.description: Language Models MVAIT is interested in the use of language models for medical tasks.

item.title: Specific Medical Domain
item.description: MVAIT has strong collaboration with clinicians from different medical domains.
